World Series
lead_paragraph: Hideki Matsui would like to come back to the Yankees, but given the aging slugger’s physical limitations, it is unclear if the interest is mutual.
snippet: Hideki Matsui would like to come back to the Yankees, but given the aging slugger’s physical limitations, it is unclear if the interest is mutual.
